English: The SLSS-100 is a short small-diameter Life-Support storage module. Perfect for your near-Kerbin solo missions or your daring long-distance missions.
The MLSS-100 is a short medium-diameter Life-Support storage module. If you need a service module to go to the Mun this is the part for you!
The MFS-200 is a medium-diameter Food storage module. This is what was used on the famous Kygnus resupply vessel.
The MFS-200 is a medium-diameter Water storage module. This is what was used on the famous Kygnus resupply vessel.
The MFS-200 is a medium-diameter Oxygen storage module. This is what was used on the famous Kygnus resupply vessel.
The PFS-10 is an extra small radially attached Food pack. Perfect for quick rover expedition on another world.
The PWS-10 is an extra small radially attached Water tank. Perfect for quick rover expedition on another world.
The POS-10 is an extra small radially attached Oxygen tank. Perfect for quick rover expedition on another world.
The TFC-300 is a medium size radially attached Food container. This is the kind of chocolate-shaped storage space you'll need for your inter-colonial resupply missions.
The TWC-300 is a medium size radially attached Water tank. This is the kind of chocolate-shaped storage space you'll need for your inter-colonial resupply missions.
The TOC-300 is a medium size radially attached Oxygen tank. This is the kind of chocolate-shaped storage space you'll need for your inter-colonial resupply missions.
Our fine botanists have perfected the technology needed to grow Leeks & Snacks in any situation: orbit
